mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where your every whim is our command! Spoil yourself with our exclusive VIP banking experience today.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, picture this-I waltz into a fancy restaurant, oozing charm and sophistication, ready to impress my date. The waiter approaches and I confidently order the most expensive bottle of champagne on the menu because, well, that's just how I roll. But to my horror, the waiter informs me they are out of that particular vintage. Out of sheer disbelief, I dramatically rise from my seat, causing a scene that echoes through the entire restaurant. I demand to speak to the manager, insisting that this is an absolute travesty and that they must right this wrong immediately. The manager rushes over, apologizing profusely and offering me a free meal as compensation. Satisfied with the outcome, I graciously accept, knowing that my unwavering sense of entitlement has once again proven to be my greatest asset. And that, my friends, is how you turn a champagne shortage into a gourmet feast fit for royalty.
